name: Boss game (itch)
description:
PLAY FULL SCREEN

Xbox controller recommended. Any other gamepads might not work atm. 

Xbox controls:

Basics:
    X: Quick attack
    RT: Gun
    LB: Dash
    D-pad Up: Heal

Fancy stuff:
    A: Parry/Reflect yellow bullets 
    Y: Combo Finisher (Costs 30 mana)
    B: Combo Extender (Costs 30 mana)
    LT: Sprint
    RB: Laser  (Costs 30 mana)
    Right analogue stick button: Time stop (Uses special pink resource)

Keyboard controls

Basics:
    WASD: Movement 
    Left Mouse Button: Gun
    Right Mouse Button: Quick attack
    Space: Dash
    Heal: 1

Fancy stuff
    F: Parry/Reflect yellow bullets  
    Middle Mouse Button: Laser (Costs 30 mana)
    Q: Combo Extender (Costs 30 mana)
    E: Combo Finisher (Costs 30 mana)
    R: Stop time (Cost 50 special power)
    Shift: Sprint 

Tutorial:
When boss loses her armor she can get stunned by melee attacks (COMBO TIME).
Get mana by hitting melee attacks + grazing bullets. 
Get special bar by getting high combos. 

Song: https://soundcloud.com/layv/barely-recognizable
